params._joe: Address of the JOE token contract
params._rJoe: Address of the rJOE token contract
params._rJoePerSec: Number of rJOE tokens created per second
params._startTime: Timestamp at which rJOE rewards starts

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: The number of pending rJOE tokens for `_user`

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MAX_EMISSION_RATE.details: The maximum emission rate per second

accRJoePerShare.details: Accumulated rJOE per share, times PRECISION. See above

totalJoeStaked.details: Balance of JOE held by contract

userInfo.details: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit joe to RocketJoeStaking for rJoe allocation

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY

pendingRJoe(address).notice: Get pending rJoe for a given `_user`

updatePool().notice: Update reward variables of the given pool with latest data

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw JOE and accumulated rJOE from RocketJoeStaking
